thread.section_title: Le Derby Alma - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent Service and Location
thread.title_full: Excellent Service and Location - Review of Le Derby Alma, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Kean Meng C
title: Excellent Service and Location
text: Highly recommended to anyone staying in Paris. it is conveniently located to a Metro and a RER station and best of all it is a 5-min walk away from Eiffel Tower! Every night walking back to the hotel is a treat with the full view of glittering lighted Eiffel Tower. The hotel staff is friendly and helpful as ever, 4 years ago and today. The room is clean and tidy; the breakfast has sufficient variety without feeling overwhelmed. The neighborhood has a nostalgic Parisian feel, the Italian restaurant and the artisan bakery shop flanking the hotel adds on to its charm . This is definitely my "Paris" hotel.
